compliant.section: You are responsible for all actions taken with your User ID and password.
compliant.legal provisions: Data Controller accountability principle:  The controller shall be responsible for, and be able to demonstrate compliance with, the data protection principles (accountability).

compliant.section: If you choose to share your User ID and password or your personal information with third parties, you are responsible for all actions taken with your account and therefore you should review that third party's privacy policy.
compliant.legal provisions: Consent must be freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous.  Sharing data with third parties requires an active action from the data subject.

compliant.section: When you visit the Site, we may send one or more "cookies" to your computer hard drive through your Web browser.
compliant.legal provisions: Information provided to data subjects must be concise, transparent, intelligible, easily accessible, and in clear and plain language.

compliant.section: Any use of cookies by us will be solely for the purposes of improving the quality of access to the Site by storing user preferences, and tracking user trends, such as how people use the Site, and their Site access preferences.
compliant.legal provisions: Data minimization and purpose limitation: Data must be collected for specified, explicit and legitimate purposes and not further processed in a manner that is incompatible with those purposes. Legitimate interest can be a legal basis for processing, but it needs to be balanced against the rights and freedoms of the data subject.

compliant.section: You are always free to decline our cookies if your browser permits, although in that case you may not be able to use certain features on the Site and you may be required to reenter your password or login information more frequently.
compliant.legal provisions: Right to withdraw consent: The data subject shall have the right to withdraw his or her consent at any time.  It shall be as easy to withdraw as to give consent.

compliant.section: We do not control the use of cookies by third parties.
compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data have not been obtained from the data subject: If data is collected from a source other than the data subject, the controller must provide the data subject with information about the processing.

non_compliant.section: You need to work to protect against unauthorized access to your passwords and to your computer by signing off once you have finished using a shared computer.
non_compliant.amend: While this is good security practice, it places the onus of security on the user rather than the data controller. GDPR focuses on the controller's obligations.

non_compliant.section: If you lose control of your password, you may lose substantial control over your personal information and may be subject to legally binding actions taken on your behalf such as if someone used your User and ID password to forward libelous material through the Service.
non_compliant.amend: This section could be interpreted as shifting responsibility for a data breach to the user.  The GDPR requires controllers to implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure a level of security appropriate to the risk.

non_compliant.section: Therefore, if your password has been compromised for any reason, you should immediately change your password.
non_compliant.amend: Again, this places the responsibility on the user. The controller should have procedures in place for suspected data breaches, including password resets and notifications to affected users and potentially the supervisory authority.

non_compliant.section: Cookies tell us how and when pages in our Site are visited and by how many people.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data minimization: Data must be adequate, relevant and limited to what is necessary for the purposes for which they are processed.  Collecting data on "how many people" visit a site may not be necessary for the stated purpose of improving site access.
non_compliant.amend: Clarify the specific purpose of collecting this data and ensure it's justified under GDPR.

non_compliant.section: We use cookies to allow you to enter your login information less frequently.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness of processing: This purpose (convenience) may not fall under the lawful bases for processing under GDPR.
non_compliant.amend: Consider using a less intrusive method or provide a stronger legal basis for processing this data.

non_compliant.section: To the extent IFTTT uses cookies, such cookies do not collect personal information, and we do not combine information collected through cookies with other personal information to tell us who you are or what your username or e-mail address is.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Online identifiers, including cookies, can constitute personal data when they can be used to identify an individual.
non_compliant.amend: Acknowledge that cookies can be considered personal data under certain circumstances and address those situations.

non_compliant.section: Most browsers are initially set up to accept cookies, but you can reset your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Consent must be freely given. Pre-ticked boxes or browser settings that automatically accept cookies do not constitute valid consent.
non_compliant.amend: Ensure users are actively giving consent for the use of cookies, rather than relying on pre-selected options.

non_compliant.section: We may use third party service providers to facilitate or outsource one or more aspects of our business and therefore we may provide some of your personal information directly to these service providers.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Data Processing Agreements and data sharing: Controllers must have appropriate contracts in place with processors, outlining the subject matter, duration, nature and purpose of the processing, the type of data, and obligations and rights of the controller.  Data subjects must be informed about the involvement of processors.

non_compliant.amend: The entire privacy policy should be reviewed and potentially rewritten to ensure it is easily understandable and accessible to the average user, as required by the GDPR.
